name: RubellaTestsForRubellaVirusNucleicAcid
title: Rubella (Tests for rubella virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Rubella nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: rubella nucleic acid;  LOINC search: "rubella virus (probe or genotype or sequencing) -panel"),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests)
